FuncDef:
The anti-attack enable command enables defense against all attack packets.
The anti-attack disable command disables defense against all attack packets.
The undo anti-attack enable command disables defense against all attack packets. The anti-attack enable command enables defense against all attack packets. The anti-attack disable command disables defense against all attack packets. The undo anti-attack enable command disables defense against all attack packets. By default, defense against all attack packets is enabled.
